title: Sega Announces Game Gear Micro - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.03.20
description:
Blessing is joined by Married To The Games' Gabe Patillo to discuss Sega's new micro console.  

 FOLLOW GABE PATILLO: 
https://twitter.com/mttgcast 
https://www.patreon.com/mttg
 https://www.marriedtothegames.com/ 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Gabe Patillo is back!
00:08:30 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Games Showcase is back, but it’s called the Guerilla Collective! As you know, we’ve teamed up with our friends at the Media Indie Exchange to do a three-day showcase featuring nearly 90 games! It all kicks off Saturday at 10 am PT on twitch.tv/guerrillacollective!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:11:00 - Sega announces the Game Gear Micro - Sam Byford @ The Verge
00:17:30 - Sega has clearly punked me with their Game Gear for ants. Jokes aside, do you take this as a sign from Sega? Reaffirming that they are not interested in entering the console war? - Best Friends Q:Mark Heath
00:21:02 - Nintendo is reportedly ‘double-matching’ employee donations to anti-racism causes - Andy Robinson @ Video Games Chronicle
00:26:30 - Cyberpunk 2077’s Night City Wire event has been delayed - Stephanie Nunneley
00:36:40 - Pokemon Sword and Shield: Isle of Armor Gets new details - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:41:35 - Out today
00:47:00 -  Brooklinen
 Reader mail   -
00:48:24 - We are now at the point in these protests where companies are putting out official statements on this country's systemic racism. Are there any companies you especially feel knocked out of the park and on the other end, do you feel any company especially whiffed? - Gondors Condor
https://www.benjerry.com/about-us/media-center/dismantle-white-supremacy
00:54:30 - Squad Up: Blake(Xbox/PC) - Bear73tx
00:55:20 - Shout-out: Who is a black voice in the industry that you want to highlight and give a shout-out
00:56:49 - Required Reading: Game Publisher Cancels Contract With Developer, Then Tries to Poach Its Entire Team by Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-06-03/kerbal-space-program-2-release-disrupted-by-corporate-strife
00:58:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Blessing and WWE Superstar Xavier Woods
